title: Skirt
description: pleated skirt; blue waistband with added ties of black and white ribbon-like fabric; skirt in two sections--top 6\" (approx.) of dark blue; lower section of black with geometric embroidery in red, green, white and some gold; side panels of bottom section are plain blue without embroidery
creditline: The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
